text.value: 1. Where do you keep records for diagnosed cases after meat inspection?
Other mechanism of keeping records for diagnosed cases
2. What do you do with meat/pork inspection records?
Just keep them in the ward office
What other ways of dealing with meat/pork inspection records
3. If you prepare meat inspection report which of the following could be the reason
I am obliged to do so as one of my responsibilities and I am facilitated
I am obliged to do so as one of my responsibilities although I am not always facilitated
I am obliged to do so as one of my responsibilities although I am not facilitated at all
Other reason of preparing meat inspection report
4. If you just keep them in ward office which of the following could be the reason
I don’t see the importance of preparing the report
I am not facilitated and I can’t use my own money to buy stationaries for such a purpose
No one has ever demanded the report from me
5. If your answer in above is ‘Prepare meat inspection report’, do you have a specific format (form) for reporting porcine cysticercosis
6. If your answer in question above is YES choose from the list provided below, the information(s) that is supposed to be filled in your disease reporting form
7. How do you prepare the report
I prepare it the way I think is the best
I use an abattoir report surveillance forms

8. If your answer in question 7 above is ‘I prepare it the way I think is the best ’ ,choose from the list provided below, the information(s) that is supposed to be filled in your disease reporting form
9. What do you do with meat inspection report you have prepared?
Keep them in the ward office
Send them to the District Livestock and Fisheries Office
Give it to the ward executive officer
10 .How do you send the report to the respective office
You are provided with a list of options (or means) with which you use to send the report to the respective office, choose the option (or mean) you normally use
Use any bodaboda/familiar traveller heading to district head quarters
Using any civil servant going to town or District Council Office (DED)
11. Which of the following could be the reason for an answer you have opted for in question 10 above?
It is the cheapest means I can afford because I am not facilitated
It is the only means by which I have to send and have been full facilitated in that aspect
I am not facilitated by any means and I have to use any option at hand at each particular time
12. How do you know that the report has reached the respective office
They call to acknowledge the receipt of the report
They write an email to acknowledge the receipt of the report
They neither call nor write to acknowledge receipt of the report and I don’t call either
Other mechanism of knowing report has been reached
13 How frequently do you send the report?
How frequently do you send report apart from listed above
14. Are you facilitated in preparing and/or submission of reports
15. who facilitates you in report preparation and submission?
Ministry of livestock and fisheries development
Where do you get other facilitation on report preparation and submission
16) If your answer in question 15 is ‘District Livestock Office ’ choose from a list of statements below, the aspects in which you are facilitated
17. Do you always submit the reports on time?
18. What is (are) the reason(s) for the delay
I am very occupied by field activities
I hardly get time to write a report
I am not facilitated by any means
I don’t see why should I bother to prepare it early and send on time
No one cares whether I send on time or I don’t send all
I don’t get anyone to help me send the report
The office head quarter is very far away for me to send report on time
Other reasons for delaying to submit

bind.relevant: (selected(/data/how_send_report_respective, 'phone_txt')) or (selected(/data/how_send_report_respective, 'email_electronic')) or (selected(/data/how_send_report_respective, 'use_public_bodaboda')) or (selected(/data/how_send_report_respective, 'use_civil_sevarnt')) or (selected(/data/how_send_report_respective, 'send_in_person')) or (selected(/data/how_send_report_respective, 'other')) and (selected(/data/what_do_meat_insp_records, 'prep_meat_insp_report'))
